issue.title: [CF 1616] "Range Check" (assassin rogue)
issue.body:
So I like to have my icons grayed out when an enemy is too far away that way I know. I have my shadow step set up so if someone is too far away the icon gets grayed out. I tried it with Garrote , Toxic blade , Exsagnate and Vendetta and none of them gray out when im too far away. I copied the setting just like my shadow step setting and for some reason they arent graying out . can you please help me


> Posted by CurseForge user EmikoLive | Imported from CurseForge issue #1616 | Raw

comments.body:
Assuming this is a spell cooldown icon, you need to check the 'range check' button in the opacity and coloring section.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
